summary: A Journal-Quest asking you to find seven keys to open the boxes located inside the Seven Keys Dungeon.
descriptionHtml:
[color=\"#B8860B\"]THIS QUEST STARTS WITH A BOOK THAT CAN BE FOUND IN FRONT OF BREEZEHOME OR MANY LOCATIONS INSIDE WHITERUN[/color]

[color=\"#B8860B\"]Other Mods:[/color]
Dovahkiin Hideout: [url=http://fusromod.com/blog/index.php?entry=39]Mirror Link[/url]

[color=\"#B8860B\"]Description:[/color]
This is a quest that can begin many ways after finding the Book of Seven Keys. You can find the Book in many locations, the easiest is right in front of Breezehome in Whiterun.

You will be asked to first find the Dungeon I have created, after that, you will notice there are a few chests in that dungeon. Read the Book of Seven Keys to learn what you have to do to succeed in opening these boxes.

This is a Journal style quest, You will not be given quest markers to help you. This makes the quest much harder. This isn\'t recommended for those who don\'t like quests.

[color=\"#B8860B\"]Install:[/color]
- Use one of the Mod Manager Clients.
OR
- Make sure everything is put into your DATA folder.

[color=\"#B8860B\"]Uninstall:[/color]
- Remove the Sevenkeys.ESP from your Data folder.

[color=\"#B8860B\"]Hints/Spoilers:[/color]
- Location of the Dungeon of Seven Keys: Look inside the Guard Bunker behind the Bannered Mare.
- Understanding the Hints: They\'re Scrambled words, unscramble them.

[color=\"#B8860B\"]Support my Mods:[/color]
Check here for options: [url=http://fusromod.com/blog/index.php?entry=40]Supporting Shawk[/url]
author: Shawk
